THANK YOU! - Johnâ­â­â­â­â­Very nice app -  KishoreThis application clear unwanted temporary files and increase internal memoryDEFRAG+ DOES NOT DEFRAGMENT FLASH MEMORYâ Option to erase internet search historyâ Cleans memory caches that slow your phone and tabletâ Deletes corrupted files which greatly boosts performanceâ Report Section detailing Used Memory / Free Memory / Repaired Files and Memory Usage PIE Chartâ Streamlined design for ease of use (KISS Principle) for your android mobile & tabletâ Select either Phone Memory or SD Card from your list and click Defrag, itâs that easyâ Beautiful user friendly interface designâ Auto landscape application lock now prevents corrupted files or an interrupted DefragâDownload the FULL versions direct now from Google Play Store.Total DEFRAG  Features:- Increased process speed- Increased battery optimization- Reduces start up times- No Advertisements during ReportTotal Defrag  works by moving, removing and repairing unwanted cache files, speeding up your Androids response and load times, freeing up your Memory and RAM by killing unwanted tasks and optionally clearing all browser history.For technical problems or issues please email us at any time. reviews.comment: It seems to do what it\'s supposed to do except the massive flood of dumb adds which slows me down and was most of the reason I downloaded this app hope its not another  F**k you courtesy of ms
reviews.author: Thomas Flavin

reviews.title: As usual ....
reviews.comment: Ads galore. Uninstall, I\'ll deal with a bit less memory and save the headache of random icons on my homepage.
reviews.author: Pat Balmer

reviews.title: So good!
reviews.comment: Happy so far. No problems.  I don\'t like using google plus which I\'m being forced to do to rate this. But the app is good and works extremely well. I\'d give it five stars if I didn\'t have to use google plus for the freakin world and friends to see.
reviews.author: wendy watson

reviews.title: Same results!
reviews.comment: Get same results everytime! Exact number of repaired files, and defrag space files! Tried another app after I used this one got the exact same results with that one too. Shouldn\'t have any files to repair after I run this app!
reviews.author: Barbara Hutchens

reviews.title: Won\'t let me
reviews.comment: Scan both phone and SD card. Timer froze at 2:58 left
reviews.author: Francis Yans

reviews.title: FUNNY
reviews.comment: Don\'t know if it scam app or not I thought this app from MICROSOFT, then I realized it\'s not
reviews.author: richard octovianus

reviews.title: Nothing but ads!
reviews.comment: New update brought on a flood, and I mean literally a flood of ads including notifications constantly popping up for gas cards, school grants, etc. Don\'t waste your time with this app or developer.
reviews.author: Lace White

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: It works really well but the developers have shared my number and now I get spam texts  Mostly celeb sex video links riddled with fraud   Dont click on them  Better not be billed with them texts otherwise Micosoft is in deep shite  Avoid unistalled
reviews.author: Chris Holden

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: It isn\'t even that useful, but ads show up every time I connect to a network.. Too annoying.. Uninstalled.

reviews.title: O k
reviews.comment: My spyware says its low risk app,but it performs what it promises so I have kept it..

reviews.title: Ads are annoying!!!!!
reviews.comment: It completely sped up my phone.. but flooded me with ads... And a lot sent through text massaging... So it kind of contradicts... It\'s defrags...but seems like all the ads slow phone down.... My advise..defrag once and delete ap immediately....
reviews.author: Annette Duarte

reviews.title: Fantastic app.. before the update
reviews.comment: Great app. Untill todays update.  Laggy and asked me over 20 times if I wanted games or free gas or cell phones...  uninstalled!
reviews.author: John Haze

reviews.title: IT\'S GOOD... I THINK....
reviews.comment: It seems to do it\'s job.  Phone runs a bit smoother after running defrag.
reviews.author: David Metzger

reviews.title: LIKE IT
reviews.comment: Speeds phone up. Lowered it 3 stars. It now puts ads in your notification bar. VERY ANNOYING.
reviews.author: Robert Mccabe

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Def seems to do what it says. I\'ve got another app on me phone that defrags too. And this one showed less data n not same. Surprising. Ty for creating great app.
reviews.author: Nora Crowder

reviews.title: Huawei Ascend Y
reviews.comment: Love it, except  for the lock and  timer. And no explanation how it works, it never counts down. I have uninstall,  then reinstall when i want to use it.
reviews.author: Barb Boyer

reviews.comment: Like it but hate the ads that keep popping up on my phone
reviews.author: Brandon Whitsell

reviews.title: Great application!
reviews.comment: Awesome app! I have been searching for weeks trying to figure out how to defrag my phone\'s internal system because it was bogging down. This app proved to be the answer i needed! Hats off to the developer!
reviews.author: Michael Adams
